short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screenshot reading support for Read&Write for Google Chrome™
short.es: Soporte de lectura de pantalla para la lectura y escritura para Google Chrome™
short.fr: Capture d'écran support de lecture pour lecture et écriture pour Google Chrome™
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Suporte de leitura de tela para leitura e gravação para o Google Chrome™

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides OCR for users of Read & Write for Google Chrome.
You should not install this extension unless you want to enable the new screenshot reading functionality released in December 2016
